resources.string:
We help you to log your mental and emotional states and provide insigt of your log. We use the state of the art machine learning techniques to detect mental problems and also try to predict the mood changes in days. You can also help us by sending those data to us and we can use that for research in psychology studies. 

When registering thoughts try to note more about your positive , action and ideas oriented thoughts and less about negative that is when something catastrophic happens. Orange and Yellow are functionalites yet to be added. 

Note your mood atleast 10 times in a day in the app. This increases your awareness and also helps the app to display you precise statistics.

string-array.name: tips
string-array.item: It is best to record your mood once for two hours
Make a entry when your mood changes drastically
When you are stressed, observe your Breath
Recording thoughts helps you to identify repeating thoughts
Record your ideas often and open up to possibilities
Some of your thoughts can destroy relations and opportunities, so be aware
When you are void of thoughts, your intelligence level will be at peak
Success comes when you manage your emotions wisely
You are a slave to fate if you dont control your emotions
Think when you need, otherwise dont alway cling with past
Observe your breath whenever you find time
Real Thinking is cognitively costly, but 90% time we do Analogies
